sentences.en: An assailant's arms are like the tiller of a ship.
sentences.cn: 攻击者的双臂就如同船的舵.

sentences.en: Can you give me a description of the assailant?
sentences.cn: 你能描述一下袭击你的那个人 吗 ?

sentences.en: He caught up a stick and struck out his assailant.
sentences.cn: 他抓起一根棍子就朝攻击他的人打去.

sentences.en: He struck out at his assailant.
sentences.cn: 他向行凶者狠狠地打去.

sentences.en: He was unable to recognize his assailant in the dark.
sentences.cn: 他在黑暗中认不出殴打他的人.

sentences.en: How tall would her assailant have to be to fit the evidence?
sentences.cn: 攻击者要做到这样大概需要多高?

sentences.en: Other party-goers rescued the injured man from his assailant.
sentences.cn: 其他参加聚会的人把这名伤者从行凶者手中救了出来。

sentences.en: Other partygoers rescued the injured man from his assailant.
sentences.cn: 其他参加聚会的人从攻击者手中救出了这名受伤的男子。

sentences.en: She grappled with her assailant but he got away.
sentences.cn: 她与袭击者扭打而他却逃走了.

sentences.en: The assailant sinks his teeth into the victim.
sentences.cn: 攻击者把他的牙齿插入受害者.

sentences.en: The assailant was set by the heels awaiting trial.
sentences.cn: 那位袭击者被捕下狱,等候审判.

sentences.en: The doctor fought with his assailant until he ran away.
sentences.cn: 医生和他的攻击者打起来,直到把那人打跑.

sentences.en: The policeman fires again, tensed against the recoil, unleashing round after round at his assailant.
sentences.cn: 警察再次开火，紧抵着反冲机构，不断向袭击他的人射击。

sentences.en: The victim put up a heroic struggle against his assailant.
sentences.cn: 那位受害者与攻击者展开了英勇的搏斗.

sentences.en: The victim said one assailant hit him with a club.
sentences.cn: 受害者说,一名行凶者用大头棒打了他.

sentences.en: You think the assailant surprised her while she was dyeing her hair?
sentences.cn: 你觉得凶手是在她染发时突然对她袭击的?

words.tran_cn: 易受攻击的，有隙可乘的
